channel.title: Command help
channel.description: Hi guys need a command example for z508 when a person has like 100m in inventory and they type ::bandosgear they get bandos gear and 100m is deleted from inventory. thx

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @magekid990 magekid990
item.description:
@magekid990 wrote:

if(cmd[0].equals("verac")){ Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4753, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4757, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4759, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4755, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11732, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 6737, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11694, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 6570, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 6585, 1); }
